personal.name: Sai Yeswanth Bhavanasi
personal.title: Android Developer & Mobile App Engineer
personal.description: Passionate Android Developer with 2+ years of experience in designing, developing, and deploying mobile applications. Skilled in Kotlin, Java, Flutter, and modern Android frameworks.

about.paragraph1: Android Developer with 2+ years of experience in designing, developing, and deploying mobile applications. Skilled in Kotlin, Java, and Jetpack Compose with expertise in API integration, Firebase, and modern Android libraries. Adept at end-to-end mobile development lifecycle, debugging, and performance optimization.
about.paragraph2: Passionate about building scalable, user-friendly apps and delivering business impact. Proficient in Kotlin, Jetpack Compose, Flutter, and Dart, with expertise in RESTful API integration, Firebase services, and modern mobile app development frameworks. Strong foundation in Object-Oriented Programming, asynchronous programming, state management, and cloud integration.

projects.title: Jeep Life App
projects.description: Mobile app for Jeep owners to explore vehicle features & connect with the community. Published on Google Play Store with high-quality UI/UX and strong performance.

projects.title: SurfBank
projects.description: A platform for users to save, organize, and share content in a structured and accessible manner. Built with modern Android architecture and intuitive UI design.

projects.title: Volkswagen Infra Audit App
projects.description: App to streamline infrastructure audits for Volkswagen dealerships. Improved audit efficiency with real-time data synchronization and offline capabilities.

projects.title: Volkswagen Assistance - Dealer App
projects.description: Dealer app to manage Volkswagen service operations & workflows. Enhanced dealer productivity with automated workflows and real-time updates.

experience.title: Android Developer
experience.description: Develop and deploy production-grade mobile applications. Implemented scalable architectures including MVVM and Clean Architecture, ensuring testability, modularity, and maintainability across Android projects.
responsibilities: Developed and deployed 4+ production-grade mobile applications published on Google Play Store
Proficient in Kotlin, Jetpack Compose, Flutter, and Dart with expertise in RESTful API integration
Implemented scalable architectures such as MVVM, VIPER, and Clean Architecture
Collaborated using Git, Bitbucket, and SourceTree, performing code reviews and debugging
Strong foundation in Object-Oriented Programming, asynchronous programming, and cloud integration

experience.title: Android Developer Intern
experience.description: Gained hands-on experience in developing Android applications with modern frameworks. Worked on API integration, Firebase services, and implementing best practices in mobile app development.
responsibilities: Developed Android applications using Kotlin and Jetpack Compose
Integrated RESTful APIs and third-party services
Implemented Firebase Authentication and Push Notifications
Participated in code reviews and collaborated with development team
Worked with modern Android libraries and development frameworks

education.description: Completed undergraduate degree with strong foundation in electronics and communication engineering. Relevant coursework includes embedded systems, digital signal processing, and wireless communication systems.

Published a paper titled 'Automation of Railway Gate and Road Traffic using Internet of Things' in IRJET (An ISO 9001:2008 certified journal) in April-May 2022, showcasing expertise in IoT, research, and publication.

contact.title: Let's Connect
contact.description: I'm always interested in hearing about new opportunities and exciting mobile app projects. Feel free to reach out!
